data.title: Start Round Mid Flash Play
data.description: Utilize Flashpoint to blind attackers quickly enabling an aggressive push from B Tunnel.

data.title: Start Round Stun Elbow Play
data.description: Stun Elbow with Fault Line to disrupt the attacker's B push.

data.title: Early Round A Main Contest
data.description: Use this lineup to quickly disrupt an A Main push with Fault Line before blinding them with Flashpoint.

data.title: Mid Wooden Doors to Bottom Mid Flashpoint
data.description: This is a good Flashpoint for Bottom Mid from Mid Wooden Doors to flash enemies and allow you to swing on them.

data.title: A Site to A Hall Flashpoint
data.description: This is a good Flashpoint to flash into A Hall from A Site.

data.title: A Hall Doors to Mid Pillar Flashpoint
data.description: This is a good Flashpoint for Mid Pillar from A Hall Doors.

data.title: B Tunnel to Mid Pillar Flashpoint
data.description: This is a good Flashpoint for Mid Pillar from B Tunnel.

data.title: Defender Spawn to B Site Aftershock
data.description: This is a good aftershock to stop someone from planting the bomb. This is also good to kill someone if they don't stop planting the bomb.
